name: Switch On (hobbitct (Miguel Escuer Sánchez), MiguelLentisco, Keryen, Jlga10, Antgar, Javier Morel Vera)
name_original: Switch On (hobbitct (Miguel Escuer Sánchez), MiguelLentisco, Keryen, Jlga10, Antgar, Javier Morel Vera)
description:
I'm Joe and I just woke up in this strange clinic being color blind! Help me get my sight back and to get out of this place!

Nanobots pills:
General dosage guidelines: single dose of 3 pills orally or rectally.
Uses: Helps with cataracts, color blindness and blindness.
Attention: Patients may experience photophobia

Developed by:

  • Enrique González Rodríguez: https://keryen.itch.io/
  • Javier Morel Vera:  https://javimorel.itch.io/
  • José Luis Gómez Antón: https://jlga10.itch.io/
  • Miguel Escuer Sánchez: https://hobbitct.itch.io/
  • Miguel Lentisco Ballesteros: https://miguellentisco.itch.io/
  • Antonio García Romero: https://antgar.itch.io/

Game developed for the Futuristic Jam 2020.
